input.value: Analysis, Analyst, Consulting, Customer Service, Development, Foundation, Manager, Management, Outlook, Project, Research, Scheduling

div.div: Analysis, Analyst, Consulting, Customer Service, Development, Foundation, Manager, Management, Outlook, Project, Research, Scheduling

font.font: This is the first-level manager accountable for supervising a team of analysts who work with the TransUnion customer base and will be specifically responsible for the expansion and acquisition of our core credit and client data assets. This manager will work closely with clients and internal groups to the team, customer requests, and issues through initial customer outreach, consultation, analysis, and execution. This job coordinates day-to-day activities for the team within the department related to customer service or service execution. In addition, this job evaluates workload and work assignment and how the work is performed. Also, this role will provide counsel to associates in their effort to accomplish the assignment and communicate desired end results and steps necessary to achieve project, team, and organizational goals.
How You'll Contribute:

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Understands processes and how they fit into “whole picture”.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Is considered the SME in a variety of technical areas. Is the ‘go to’ person for certain areas of expertise.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Understands a variety of software applications and how they interface. Identifies and improves intra-departmental processes that have multiple steps.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Develops departmental processes to improve the delivery of products to customers.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Recommends enhancements to current systems or identifies new processes for teams.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of technical skills.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Demonstrates a business acumen that goes beyond their role. Aggressively pursues external business trends to have a clear understanding of how external factors affect business. Interprets data and applies to DAS department.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Understands overall company goals and how associate and DAS role impacts the success of them. Identifies and implements improvements to established cross-departmental communications.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of cross-departmental communication skills.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Identify, develop and maintain a positive active network of diverse colleagues throughout the organization in order to accomplish work and sell new ideas.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Persuades and influences others with accurate information.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Confronts situations in a constructive manner.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Understands and appreciates differences in coworkers and customers and is able to respond to their individual needs relative to the job associate performs.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Establishes on-going sustainable relationships in order to improve products and services provided by TransUnion.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides SME advice and direction.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Interprets a variety of procedures within department. Develops cross-functional communications.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Communicates clearly with meaning.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Listens attentively and participates actively with peers and customers in order to develop meaningful products.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of interpersonal skills. Handles escalated customer questions and issues.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Displays control and flexibility in ambiguous or stressful situations within department.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Maintains a positive outlook with focused demeanor.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Encourages others to reach goals and aids them in overcoming obstacles.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Helps others meet deadlines.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Anticipates the need for help or change and reacts appropriately in support of business goals.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Prioritizes heavier workloads for analyst(s).

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Delegate’s projects or tasks to other team members to insure customer expectations are met.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of adaptability and flexibility skills.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Acts as a critical resource for others.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Employs creative solutions to complex problems. Determines which resource to utilize throughout TransUnion for customer issues.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Determines strengths of team members to accomplish DAS objectives. Assigns analysts as appropriate.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Oversees process improvements and approves sharing with the team. Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of resourcefulness skills.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Applies understanding of customer’s business and TransUnion’s capabilities in recommending alternative solutions to customers.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Applies knowledge of systems, data processing, and customer requirements to uncover problems and recommend solutions always complex in nature.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides direction to analysts with complex research or investigations. Responsible for communicating outcome of complex research to Manager or more Senior Management.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Responsible for escalating customer or other issues to Senior Management. Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of analytical/consulting skills.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Considers input from the team, oversees the contribution of team efforts, and directs the activities of others on the team.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Responsible for team’s workflow (i.e. balance high priority projects among team), schedules, and attendance.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Leads team meetings to insure communication of key deadlines, projects, or key events.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Helps resolve conflict and promotes positive collaboration. Provides guidance and direction on various aspects of teamwork skills.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Brings visions and long-term goals to fruition.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Comprehends and manages a variety of different issues and creates effective, creative solutions.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Identifies and assists in the development of comprehensive procedures that have cross-functional impact.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Has expertise in specialized areas and knowledge to perform job responsibilities.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Accomplishes multiple work efforts independently or through leading or guiding others.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Provides input and participates in the performance management process.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: This process includes performance reviews, promotion assessment, and performance issues.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Responsible for assessing skills for associate development and recommending training opportunities.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Performs other related duties as assigned.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: The incumbent must have a Bachelor’s degree or the equivalent years of related business experience in a data processing, quality control, or customer service environment and should have demonstrated ability to coordinate and supervise a group of employees with changing priorities and deadlines.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Incumbents typically have at least 5 years of professionally developed skills with demonstrated experience in leading a group of professional positions.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Must be able to work independently yet function as part of a team.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Needs to possess a strong working knowledge of the business unit’s computer system and the applications used to produce work.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Must be able to explain the goals of the business unit, along with methods of obtaining them.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Must have a strong business sense and the ability to collaborate with other departments.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Must possess very strong verbal and written skills and the ability to communicate with all levels of the organization.

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto

font.font: Needs strong planning and scheduling skills.
What You'll Bring :

ul.li: The incumbent must have a Bachelor’s degree or the equivalent years of related business experience in a data processing, quality control, or customer service environment and should have demonstrated ability to coordinate and supervise a group of employees with changing priorities and deadlines.
Incumbents typically have at least 5 years of professionally developed skills with demonstrated experience in leading a group of professional positions.
Must be able to work independently yet function as part of a team.
Needs to possess a strong working knowledge of the business unit’s computer system and the applications used to produce work.
Must be able to explain the goals of the business unit, along with methods of obtaining them.
Must have a strong business sense and the ability to collaborate with other departments.
Must possess very strong verbal and written skills and the ability to communicate with all levels of the organization.
Needs strong planning and scheduling skills

br.div: We aim high — and are reaching for new heights every day. This is a terrific time to join our team as we build on our commitment to integrity, service, reliability and innovation. These values stand behind the decisions we make every day, as well as our relationships at work and with the customers we serve. We believe in the power to achieve and are taking it in bold new directions.

A global leader in credit information and information management services, TransUnion gives businesses, consumers and the global community the power to achieve their goals. Businesses count on us to better manage risk and customer relationships. Consumers are able to better manage credit to achieve their financial goals. And in communities around the world we help build strong economies and give people the power to achieve their dreams.

Exceptional opportunities are coming as we build on this strong foundation. Our ambitious growth strategy includes substantial new investment worldwide, a wide range of new solutions to help our customers succeed like never before, and new ideas for expanding our reach in every part of our dynamic and fast-moving industry. We’re on an exciting journey and you can be a part of it.
